snippet.title: Animated Puzzles Star - Short Trailer
snippet.description:
Animated Puzzles Star - Coming soon for Steam, Windows, iOS and Android.

Animated Puzzles Star is a Jigsaw-style puzzle game with a fun and fascinating twist, animated pictures.

A wonderful pastime, in which beautiful photos are combined with natural motions and effects, giving you a puzzle experience above the ordinary. The soft animations keep you relaxed, at the same time as it adds a fun and challenging twist to the gameplay. A twist that keeps your mind sharp and intrigued. 

A joyful game that suits almost any age, from young to old.
